https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mtsStuGTPJlmmQSaBbm6mmM01Zz.jpg After surviving the events of the first movie, Vanessa has gone into hiding after being threatened by the government. However, a group of researchers find her and soon convince her to go back to the mountains, and this time, the dragons are more deadly than ever. Dragon Fury: Wrath Of Fire
